sentence.Network_en: Photolettering: Method of setting display sized type photographically from film master.

sentence.Network_en: Photographically bald eagles are a challenge to capture on film or digital sensors.
sentence.Network_cn: 摄影秃头鹰,是一个挑战,捕捉影片或数字传感器.

sentence.Network_en: No one is allowed to record indoor conference activities electronically or photographically without permission from TAC - EC.
sentence.Network_cn: 除大会许可之人员外,一律不准照相、录影、或录音大会主办之室内节目.

entry.def: Photographic means connected with photographs or photography.

example.ex: The bank is able to provide photographic evidence of who used the machine.
example.tran: 银行能提供用过该机器的顾客的影像证据。

entry.def: If you have a photographic memory, you are able to remember things in great detail after you have seen them.

example.ex: He had a photographic memory for maps.

auth_sentence.content: It was the first satellite to be discovered photographically.

auth_sentence.content: Early starts are always rewarded photographically; this time with frost, mist, ponies, a fowl and a rutting stag.
